about_the_game:
CAN YOU HIT THE APPLE ON THE HEAD?
Be the knifemaster who makes the most stunning tricks! You can do whatever you want, and complete a level in different ways. All in bullet time slow mo! You can play only for fun or competitively online: in any 10 sec game you have a chance to break the World Record, visible for all players! You have 2 knives at start. Earn gold to buy other weapons by completing story levels, achievements, online battle levels, finding treasures, winning challenges.
And a mega bonus for inviting your friend. We reward every invite with 50X multiplier now!

TRICKS YOU CAN DO:
- Stuck, Slice, Pierce, Pin objects - all can be part of a multi combo!
- Hat Trick: hit your friend's hat without hitting him!
- Team Trick: pass a knife to your friend who finishes the job!
- Underhand Trick: Throw with reverse spin and hit a target!
- Spin Trick: Spin the knife at least 450 degrees before hitting the target!
- Overtake Trick: Triple combo an object but in different order!
- Sacrifice Trick: Quickly hit your partner after you have completed the level.

FEATURES:
- 50 Story Levels
- 3000+ online map levels
- XP and gold system
- 48 weapons (No-Spin Knife, Spin Knife, Axe, Fork, Cleaver, Nails, Card, Sickle, Scythe, Sword, Shuriken, Sawblade, Sabre, Dart, Spear, Tomahawk, Swiss Knife, Frisbee, Boomerang, Crossbow, Pistol, etc)
- Leaderboard for each weapon, each level!
- Survival levels: how far can you get?
- Daily challange: one-chance circus: online challenge each day where you can try only once (new levels each day).
- Level Editor and Community Levels

CAUTION Cut Hazard: Product has functional sharp edges. Contact may result in injury. Always keep blades away
from fingers and body. Handle with care. Use with adult supervision.
detailed_description:
REPLAYABILITY

Replayability was our top priority (beside fun, and freedom). I'm not afraid to say: you have infinite ways to complete a level. It is because we made the game physics as open and flexible as possible. Everything can happen: The video shows an unfortunate chain of events: knife hits the table, planks break, planks flying and hitting your friend towards the sawblade (which is a fail - but Hat Trick is completed).


CLICK BELOW TO JOIN US ON DISCORD


TOTAL THROW CONTROL

We developed a new throwing method for fun, but it worked out so well, we decided to make this game. It is not used in other games, so it is not easy for first, but once you get the hang of it, you will be able to hit even small objects!


REAL PHYSICS DESTRUCTION

Physics are very important part of this game:
WEAPONS have grips (bouncing), tips (stucking), edges (slicing) which all acts differently. Everything is calculated real time. Objects (level parts, fruits, targets and even characters) are sliced exactly where they meet the blades.

name: Knife To Meet You

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP (latest SP)
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb Dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A blade simulator that focuses on maximum fun. 48 crazy weapons, a new 'total throw control' mechanism, real physics, object destruction (3-level slicing, piercing, pinning, explosions). Funny story mode, competitive leaderboards and Sand Box / Level Editor to build and share your hilarious levels.
